survey_name: Customer Preferences for Eco-Friendly Packaging in E-Commerce Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and willingness to pay for eco-friendly packaging options in online shopping.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop online?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: How often do you shop online?

questions.question_text: What type of packaging do you typically receive with your online orders? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections but limit to 6 options for readability.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes), include 'Other' as open-text if selected

script.question_text: What type of packaging do you typically receive with your online orders? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is eco-friendly packaging when making an online purchase?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons), display options vertically

script.question_text: How important is eco-friendly packaging when making an online purchase?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay extra for eco-friendly packaging options? If yes, how much more?
answer_options: No, not willing to pay extra
Yes, up to 1% of order value
Yes, more than 5% of order value
questions.client_notes: Include a clear 'No' option to avoid forcing responses.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay extra for eco-friendly packaging options? If yes, how much more?
answer_options: No, not willing to pay extra
Yes, up to 1% of order value
Yes, more than 5% of order value

questions.question_text: What specific eco-friendly packaging materials would you prefer to see in your online orders?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unprompted preferences. Limit response to 200 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT (text area with character limit)

script.question_text: What specific eco-friendly packaging materials would you prefer to see in your online orders?

questions.question_text: Have you ever chosen or avoided an online retailer based on their packaging practices?
answer_options: Yes, chosen a retailer for eco-friendly packaging
Yes, avoided a retailer for excessive/uneco-friendly packaging
No, packaging doesn't influence my retailer choice
questions.client_notes: Mutually exclusive options with neutral alternative.

script.question_text: Have you ever chosen or avoided an online retailer based on their packaging practices?
answer_options: Yes, chosen a retailer for eco-friendly packaging
Yes, avoided a retailer for excessive/uneco-friendly packaging
No, packaging doesn't influence my retailer choice
